lead_paragraph: The Tin Man broke first from the gate and led the entire way yesterday to win the Arlington Million in Arlington Heights, Ill. The Tin Man, an 8-year-old gelding trained by Richard Mandella and ridden by Victor Espinoza, set the pace early and held off a late charge from Cacique in the stretch to win by a length.
